title: How do I determine what to use as the invoice number?

sections.title: Symptoms
content: • I'm filling out an invoice for my Ads payment request and I'm unsure what to use as the invoice number.

sections.title: Cause
content: It can be a little confusing to figure out what information you should add when constructing your invoice for the first time.

sections.title: Resolution
content: The invoice number is determined by you.
If it is your first Unity Ads payment request, you can use "0000001" if you like, for example.
If you are part of a company, you may wish to speak with your finance team in order to find out what the invoice number should be.

sections.title: More Information
content: For more information, take a look at Unity Ads documentation on what information is required in an invoice.
